def_en: A three-dimensional object is solid rather than flat, because it can be measured in three different directions, usually the height, length, and width. The abbreviation 3-D can also be used.

def_cn: (照片、图像、电影)三维的，有立体感的(缩略形式为 3-D)
def_en: A three-dimensional picture, image, or film looks as though it is deep or solid rather than flat. The abbreviation 3-D can also be used.

def_cn: (虚构的人物)栩栩如生的，逼真的，鲜活的
def_en: If you describe fictional characters as three-dimensional you mean that they seem real and natural.

def_cn: (艺术、设计)立体的(缩略形式为 3-D)
def_en: Three-dimensional art or design is produced by carving or shaping stone, wood, clay, or other materials. The abbreviation 3-D can also be used.
